758050.name: Internet Simulator
758050.description:
Welcome to Internet Simulator's store page!


In the game you can browse the Internet from beautiful locations, interact with the computer and the environment.


Features:

-Ability to browse the internet via a virtual computer
-OS on the computer with mail and gallery, PC can be turned off via a button within the OS interface
-Comments when you visit certain web-sites
-3 Levels to choose from (much more to come)
-Interactivity and a feature of the level "Room" - you can turn on and off the lights, turn off the computer through the PC case, and you can also kill the character forcing him to jump out the window.
-Interactive objects that can be moved
-Ability to walk, run, sit on a chair
-Steam Achievements
-Ability to pray to Putin and get money for that (Tab to pray, E to stop praying)
-Ability to buy furniture for that money in online store
-3 different characters
-2 camera modes

Current levels:
-Room
-Toilet
-Beach

The main goals of this project are to give a person an ability to browse the internet from really beautiful places. To relax, escape from reailty being surrounded by mountains.
It's a place where you can morally rest, forget about everything. Just be surrounded by beauty, believe what you find there and for example watch movies or listen to relaxing music. You can even use forums and imageboads inside this game.
758050.supported_languages:
俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
